item.title: 加蓬以威胁安全与稳定为由暂停社交媒体服务
item.description: 加蓬媒体监管机构发表声明称，该国已暂停部分社交媒体平台的运营，理由是相关帖文可能破坏社会凝聚力，威胁机构稳定及国家安全。【原文：Gabon has suspended some social media platforms, citing concerns that posts could undermine social cohesion and threaten the stability of institutions and national security, the Central African country's media regulator said in a statement.】

item.title: Pinterest上调季度营收预期，tvScientific交易助力业绩增长
item.description: Pinterest（股票代码：PINS.N）周三宣布上调第一季度营收预期，此前该公司已完成对联网电视（CTV）广告平台tvScientific的收购。【原文：Pinterest PINS.N on Wednesday raised its forecast for first-quarter revenue after completing its acquisition of connected-TV (CTV) advertising platform tvScientific.】

item.title: 佳明预测年度业绩向好，得益于可穿戴设备需求强劲
item.description: 导航设备制造商佳明周三预测全年营收和利润将超出华尔街预期，主要得益于高端可穿戴设备和健身产品的强劲需求，其股价在盘前交易中上涨13%。【原文：Navigation device maker Garmin forecast annual revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday driven by strong demand for high-end wearables and fitness products, sending its shares up 13% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 全球支付公司股价飙升，季度利润增长且年度预测强劲
item.description: 全球支付公司周三公布财报，其全年盈利预期高于华尔街预期，且第四季度利润实现增长，推动这家支付技术公司的股价在盘前交易中上涨逾8%。【原文：Global Payments forecast annual earnings above Wall Street estimates and reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, sending the payment technology firm's shares up over 8% in trading before the bell.】

item.title: 爱彼迎向国际足联世界杯主办城市的首次房东提供750美元奖励
item.description: 旅行租赁平台爱彼迎正推出750美元激励计划，旨在吸引北美16座城市的新房东加入。这些城市正为迎接2026年中期国际足联世界杯期间的数百万游客做准备。【原文：Travel rental platform Airbnb is rolling out a $750 incentive to attract new hosts in the 16 North American cities gearing up to welcome millions of visitors for the FIFA World Cup in mid-2026.】

item.title: 穆迪预测2026年盈利前景乐观，因信用评级需求强劲
item.description: 穆迪周三预测年度利润将超出预期，押注在债务发行激增的背景下，其信用评级业务将持续获得需求支撑。【原文：Moody's forecast annual profit above estimates on Wednesday, betting on sustained demand for its credit ratings amid surging debt issuance.】

item.title: 威瑞信季度利润超预期，得益于数据分析需求持续稳定
item.description: 维瑞斯克公司周三公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，得益于其数据分析服务需求的持续稳定，该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨近10%。【原文：Verisk's fourth-quarter profit topped Wall Street expectations on Wednesday on the back of steady demand for its data analytics offerings, sending its shares up nearly 10% before the bell.】

item.title: 模拟设备公司第二季度业绩强劲，人工智能热潮推动芯片销售
item.description: 模拟设备公司周三公布的第二季度业绩超出华尔街预期，这得益于工业和数据中心客户的强劲需求——随着人工智能热潮持续推动半导体销售增长。【原文：Analog Devices On Wednesday, forecast second-quarter results above Wall Street estimates, driven by robust demand from industrial and data center customers as the artificial intelligence boom continues to drive semiconductor sales.】

item.title: 瑞银上调今年大型科技公司债券发行预测
item.description: 瑞银周三上调了对2026年美国科技投资级债券发售量的预测，指出大型科技企业支出正在增加；同时下调了对杠杆贷款的预测，因预期人工智能相关的颠覆性影响可能抑制供应。【原文：UBS lifted its 2026 forecasts for U.S. tech investment grade bond sales on Wednesday, pointing to rising spending by big tech firms, while cutting its forecast for leveraged loans on expectations that AI-related disruption could curb supply.】

item.title: 大型食品企业斥资数百万进行品牌重塑，肥胖症药物正重塑美国市场需求
item.description: 随着越来越多的人服用抑制食欲的GLP-1药物来减肥，从百事可乐到可口可乐等全球食品饮料公司正致力于在2026年推出成分表更简短、包装规格更小的产品。【原文：Global food and beverage companies from PepsiCo to Coca-Cola are focusing on shorter ingredient lists and smaller pack sizes in 2026 as more people take appetite-suppressing GLP-1 drugs for weight loss.】

item.title: 帕洛阿尔托股价下跌，人工智能安全推进中交易成本不断累积
item.description: 周三盘前交易中，帕洛阿尔托网络股价下跌6%，此前这家网络安全公司因近期收购交易（包括250亿美元收购CyberArk）导致整合成本上升，下调了年度盈利预期。【原文：Palo Alto shares fell 6% in pre-market trading on Wednesday after the cybersecurity firm lowered its annual profit forecast on higher integration costs related to recent acquisitions, including its $25 billion CyberArk deal.】

item.title: 优步将斥资逾1亿美元投资自动驾驶汽车充电设施，加速推进无人驾驶出租车业务
item.description: 优步科技周三宣布将投资逾1亿美元开发自动驾驶汽车充电枢纽，彰显这家网约车公司正大力推进自动驾驶业务的扩张。【原文：Uber Technologies said on Wednesday it would invest more than $100 million to develop autonomous vehicle charging hubs, underscoring the ride-hailing company's latest push to scale up self-driving operations.】

item.title: 晨间竞标：拉加德的更迭
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: HF Sinclair盈利超预期，首席执行官宣布自愿休假
item.description: HF Sinclair周三公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，得益于其产品炼油利润率的提升。该公司同时宣布，首席执行官Tim Go将自愿休假离岗。【原文：HF Sinclair topped Wall Street estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher refining margins for its products, and said CEO Tim Go would take a voluntary leave of absence from his duties.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称，蒂森克虏伯最早可能在2026年剥离其材料贸易部门
item.description: 知情人士透露，蒂森克虏伯可能最早在今年剥离、上市或出售其材料贸易部门，并正考虑改变该业务的法律形式，以确保在出售多数股权时仍能保持控制权。【原文：Thyssenkrupp could spin off, list or divest its materials trading division as soon as this year and is considering changing the business's legal form to keep control in case of a majority sale, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员奇波隆内表示，数字欧元将保护欧洲银行和银行卡体系
item.description: 欧洲央行一位高级政策制定者周三表示，数字欧元的设计将确保其保护欧洲银行卡体系，并使银行继续处于欧元区支付系统的核心地位。【原文：The digital euro will be designed to ensure it protects European card schemes and keep banks at the core of the euro zone payments system, a senior European Central Bank policymaker said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 拜耳撤回和解协议，投资者对解决农达诉讼的交易态度转冷
item.description: 拜耳公司股价周三暴跌9.2%，抹去了前一日的涨幅。投资者质疑该公司就其除草剂"农达"引发的癌症诉讼案提出的72.5亿美元和解方案，能否成为扭转颓势的转折点。【原文：Bayer's shares slumped as much as 9.2% on Wednesday, wiping out the previous day's gains, as investors questioned whether a proposed $7.25 billion settlement of cancer lawsuits over its Roundup weedkiller would mark a decisive turnaround.】

item.title: 阳光、沙滩与空荡的海滩：特朗普的石油封锁扼杀了古巴旅游业
item.description: 古巴的巴拉德罗半岛宛如一张热带天堂的明信片：碧绿海水、细白沙滩与棕榈树。【原文：Cuba's Varadero peninsula is a postcard of a tropical paradise: turquoise waters, powder-white sand and palm trees.】

item.title: 随着美国农业陷入困境，农民们认为扩大玉米种植面积是实现收支平衡的最佳选择。
item.description: 尽管去年玉米丰收导致价格暴跌，美国农民预计在2026年仅会小幅减少玉米种植面积，因为他们正准备迎接连续第四年利润微薄甚至亏损的局面。【原文：U.S. farmers, though punished by slumping prices after last year's monster corn harvest, are expected to cut back only slightly on their plantings of the grain in 2026 as they brace for a fourth straight year of narrow profit margins or even losses.】

item.title: Meta公司扎克伯格在青少年成瘾诉讼案中接受质询
item.description: Meta Platforms首席执行官、亿万富翁Facebook创始人马克·扎克伯格将于周三首次在美国法庭接受质询，内容涉及Instagram对年轻用户心理健康的影响。这场关于青少年社交媒体成瘾的里程碑式审判仍在持续。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO and billionaire Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg is set to be questioned for the first time in a U.S. court on Wednesday about Instagram's effect on the mental health of young users, as a landmark trial over youth social media addiction continues.】

item.title: 极星汽车依靠改款车型来节省资金并提升欧洲销量
item.description: 电动汽车制造商极星周三表示，将在未来一年内推出其最畅销车型极星2和极星4的升级版，以支撑欧洲市场销量。该公司选择通过快速、低成本的升级而非推出全新车型来遏制资金流失。【原文：Electric vehicle maker Polestar will roll out refreshed versions of its top-selling Polestar 2 and 4 models over the next year to support European sales, it said on Wednesday, choosing quick, lower-cost updates over all-new models to stem its cash bleed.】

item.title: 沃尔玛将谨慎迈入2026年，福纳时代拉开序幕
item.description: 投资者数月来对沃尔玛持乐观态度，但华尔街预计这家美国最大零售商将在周四公布财报时对年度预测采取审慎态度，因新任首席执行官约翰·弗纳正带领公司穿越脆弱的消费环境。【原文：Investors have been upbeat about Walmart for months, but Wall Street expects the largest U.S. retailer to take a measured approach to its annual forecasts when it reports results on Thursday, as new CEO John Furner steers the company through a fragile consumer landscape.】

item.title: 美联储会议纪要或凸显风险平衡转变，因决策者维持利率不变
item.description: 美联储1月16日至17日会议纪要于周三公布，预计将详细说明央行决策者上月维持利率不变的原因，以及在就业市场风险可能正在缓解、通胀降温进程缓慢的背景下，需要哪些条件才能说服他们进一步降息。【原文：Minutes of the U.S. Federal Reserve's January 16-17 meeting released on Wednesday are expected to provide more detail on why central bankers kept interest rates on hold last month and what it may take to convince them further rate cuts are warranted at a time when risks to the job market may be easing and progress on lowering inflation has been slow.】

item.title: 德国铁路预订系统遭遇DDoS攻击
item.description: 德国铁路公司周三表示，其预订和信息系统在周二遭受分布式拒绝服务（DDoS）攻击后，现已恢复正常，所有客户均可使用。【原文：The booking and information systems for Germany's railway operator are back online for all customers after being disrupted by a Distributed Denial-of-Service (DDoS) attack on Tuesday, the railway said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国股指期货走高，科技板块情绪改善
item.description: 周三美国股指期货上涨，科技股走高反映出市场对人工智能的担忧有所缓解，同时投资者正等待美联储最新政策会议纪要，以寻找利率前景的线索。【原文：U.S. stock index futures gained on Wednesday as tech stocks advanced reflecting easing AI concerns, while investors awaited minutes from the Federal Reserve's most recent policy meeting for clues on the interest-rate outlook.】

item.title: 据消息人士透露，印度要求某大学退出人工智能峰会，因该校将中国机器人冒充为本国研发成果。
item.description: 两名政府消息人士称，印度某大学因一名工作人员将中国制造的商用机器人狗冒充本校研发成果展出，已被要求撤出该国旗舰人工智能峰会展位。【原文：An Indian university has been asked to vacate its stall at the country's flagship AI summit after a staff member was caught presenting a commercially available robotic dog made in China as its own creation, two government sources said.】

item.title: 英飞凌首席执行官指出人形机器人芯片的发展前景
item.description: 英飞凌科技首席执行官向《商报》表示，这家德国半导体制造商已做好充分准备，将从人形机器人用微芯片市场的未来繁荣中获益。【原文：The CEO of Infineon Technologies told daily Handelsblatt that the German semiconductor maker is well-positioned to benefit from a future boom in the market for microchips used in humanoid robots.】

item.title: 据《金融时报》报道，摩根大通计划在2026年开设超过160家分行。
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，摩根大通计划于2026年在美国30多个州开设逾160家分行，作为其对实体网点网络数十亿美元投资计划的一部分。【原文：JPMorgan Chase is planning to open over 160 branches in more than 30 states across the United States in 2026 as part of a multibillion-dollar investment into its brick-and-mortar network, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新西兰联储新任行长首次会议聚焦透明度
item.description: 新西兰央行行长在周三的首次政策会议上保持了谨慎态度，重点在于准确传达政策信号，避免重蹈前任的覆辙。【原文：New Zealand's central bank chief played a straight bat at her inaugural policy meeting on Wednesday, with a focus on getting her messaging right and avoiding the missteps of her predecessor.】

item.title: 西部数据将出售价值31.7亿美元的闪迪股权
item.description: 闪存制造商闪迪周三表示，西部数据将出售其价值31.7亿美元的股份。【原文：Flash memory maker Sandisk on Wednesday said that Western Digital will sell a stake worth $3.17 billion in the company.】
